text: == Predicted and scheduled events == * 1 January â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1945 will enter the public domain in the United States. * 10 March - the passage of the comet 14P/Volfa near Jupiter. The diameter of the comet's nucleus is estimated to be 4.6 km. * 23 October - 100th anniversary of the Dumbo. * 22 November - 50th anniversary of the Beauty and the Beast. * 7 December - 100th anniversary of the Attack on Pearl Harbor. * Scheduled completion of the proposed project to create a railroad connecting Moscow to New York.
